title: [Gavelsdown Hall, Parlor North]
description: Twilight hues spill through the open windows, giving the dimly lit room a bruised appearance that is a vivid contrast to the plush carpeting and gold fixtures.  High-backed leather armchairs are arranged in social circles throughout the space, while an elaborately carved cabinet occupies a space along the back wall.  The thick scent of cherry tobacco fills the air.
